page.title: 17INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: IMPORTANT DEVELOPMENTS HAVE TAKEN PLACE AT MARCH ROAD. THORN LIGHTING HAVE A FACTORY WHICH ASSEMBLES A VARIETY OF ELECTRIC LIGHT LAMPS. THIS FACTORY CAME TO BUCKIE IN THE 195O'S AND WAS PARTICULARLY VALUABLE IN THAT IT ADDED VARIETY TO THE FISHING DOMINATED ECONOMY OF BUCKIE. IN THE 197O'S AND 198O'S FURTHER INDUSTRIAL DEVELOPMENT HAS TAKEN PLACE IN THIS PART OF BUCKIE. COX'S IS A FISH PROCESSING FIRM AND THEIR IS ALSO A FIRM KNOW AS F.A.L WHICH SPECIALISES IN MARINE PROPELLORS. THE SCOTTISH DEVELOPMENT DEPARTMENT DESIGNATED AN INDUSTRIAL ESTATE AND THE FACTORY UNITS INCLUDE A NET FACTORY, AND ELECTRICAL FIRM AND A SMALL SWEET FACTORY. CRUIKSHANKS, THE CONT_
